metadata.title: CVE-2021-4204 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel'seBPF due to an Improper Input Validation. This flaw allows a local attackerwith a special privilege to crash the system or leak internal information.
